content: these slippers are worked flat the slippers are worked with yarn doubled finished measurements approximately 9 from top of cuff to sole 11 from heel to toe approximately 500 yards worsted weight yarn us size 9 circular needles a circular needle 24 or longer is used to make the picking up of stitches along the foot easier gauge 12 stitches x 24 row = 4 in garter stitch direct pdf 1 1 https //seamenschurch org/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/cas-pattern-nolas-slippers pdf
